IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO BRING ABOUT A LIFE WITH DIGNITY FOR INDIVIDUALS, FAMILIES AND CHILDREN OF WEST VIRGINIA AND TO ALLEVIATE THE AFFECTS OF POVERTY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ALLEVIATE POVERTY, DISTRESS, AND INJUSTICE BY PROVIDING COMPREHENSIVE SOCIAL SERVICES TO THE POOR AND VULNERABLE, ADVOCATING FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE, AND CALLING ALL PEOPLE OF GOOD WILL, ESPECIALLY THOSE OF THE CHURCH, TO SERVICE.
IRS990.Desc: REGIONAL/COMMUNITY BASED SERVICES PROVIDES UTILITY, MEDICAL, PRESCRIPTION, HOUSING, TRANSPORTATION, CLOTHING, FLOOD AND FOOD ASSISTANCE FOR THE NEEDY AND POOR.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CHILD NUTRITION PROVIDES MEAL AND SNACK REIMBURSEMENT TO IN HOME DAY CARE PROVIDERS WHO MEET NUTRITIONAL REQUIRMENTS. IT INSURES THAT CHILDREN WHO STAY WITH DAY CARE PROVIDERS RECEIVE GOOD NUTRITIOUS MEALS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: ELDERLY CASE MANAGEMENT and HOMECARE PROVIDES SUPERVISION OF SERVICES TO ELDERLY ADULTS TO ENABLE THEM TO REMAIN IN THEIR HOME RATHER THAN BEING PLACED IN A NURSING HOME FACILITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: SUPPLEMENTAL NUTRITION ASSISTANCE PROGRAM ASSISTS LOW-INCOME INDIVIDUALS IN APPLYING FOR SNAP BENEFITS.
REFUGEE RESETTLEMENT PROVIDES RESETTLEMENT SERVICES TO ANY REFUGEES ENTERING WEST VIRGINIA.
DEVELOPMENTALLY DELAYED CHILDREN CASE MANAGEMENT PROVIDES SCREENING AND REFERRAL SERVICES FOR CHILDREN AGES BIRTH TO THREE WITH DEVELOPMENTAL DELAYS.
CHILD DAY CARE RESOURCES ASSISTS LOW-INCOME FAMILIES LOCATE NEEDED DAY CARE FOR THEIR CHILDREN SO THAT THE ADULTS CAN LOCATE EMPLOYMENT OR RETURN TO SCHOOL.

PARISH SOCIAL MINISTRY ASSISTS THE CATHOLIC FAITHFUL TO BETTER UNDERSTAND THE PRINCIPLES OF CATHOLIC SOCIAL TEACHING AND SEEKS WAYS TO PUT THESE PRINCIPLES INTO CONCRETE ACTION IN THEIR DAILY LIVES. IT SEEKS TO BUILD EFFECTIVE PARTNERSHIPS WITH PARISHES OF THE DIOCESE OF WHEELING-CHARLESTON IN ORDER TO ORGANIZE AND FULFILL WORKS OF CHARITY AND JUSTICE IN LOCAL COMMUNITIES.
DISASTER SERVICES ASSISTS WITH STATE-WIDE DISASTERS AND COORDINATES CAMPS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE FOR THE NEEDY AND POOR OF CERTAIN COUNTIES IN WEST VIRGINIA.
DIRECT FUND RAISING EXPENSES 76,566. ROUNDING ADJUSTMENT -1.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: CHILD NUTRITION- FUNDS TO ELIGIBLE PROVIDERS
CHILD DAY CARE RESOURCES- FUNDS TO ELIGIBLE PROVIDERS
ELDERLY CASE MANAGEMENT AND HOMECARE- EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE
SUPPLEMENTAL NUTRITION ASSISTANCE PROGRAM- FUNDS TO ELIGIBLE RECIPIENT
DISASTER SERVICES- EMERGENCY ASSISTANCE TO VICTIMS OF THE WEST VIRGINIA FLOODS

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: FOOD, UTILITIES, HOUSING, CLOTHING, MEDICAL, HYGINE, AND OTHER ASSISTANCE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: It is the responsibility of the Finance Director to review the grant contract and extract any fiscal items requiring compliance by CCWVa. Once funding has been expended, CCWVa reviews all expenditures by the receipts.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, SCH I, PART III, COLUMN B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHILD NUTRITION CCWVA DISTRIBUTED FUNDS TO APPROXIMATELY 4,908 PROVIDERS DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. REFUGEE RESETTLEMENT CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 1 FAMILIY DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. CHILD DAY CARE RESOURCES CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 315 FAMILIES DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. ELDERLY CASE MANAGEMENT AND HOMECARE CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 13 FAMILIES DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. SUPPLEMENTAL NUTRITION ASSISTANCE PROGRAM CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 5 FAMILIES DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. DISASTER SERVICES CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 20 FAMILIES DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS. REGIONAL COMMUNITY BASED SERVICES CCWVA PROVIDED ASSISTANCE APPROXIMATELY TO 101,570 FAMILIES DURING THE YEAR BASED ON SPECIFIC RECORDS.

FOR PART I, COLUMN B, THE ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF ITEMS RECEIVED FOR CLOTHING AND HOUSEHOLD GOODS AND FOOD INVENTORY. THE ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS RECEIVED FOR ALL OTHER TYPES OF PROPERTY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION IS THE BISHOP OF THE DIOCESE AND HIS SUCCESSORS IN OFFICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOLE MEMBER ELECTS THE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS THE AUTHORITY TO ADOPT BYLAWS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY THE SOLE MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO REVIEW WAS OR WILL BE CONDUCTED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROMPT, FULL AND FRANK DISCLOSURE TO THE BOARD OR COMMITTEE IS REQUIRED. THE BODY TO WHICH THE DISCLOSURE IS MADE DETERMINES BY MAJORITY VOTE WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE MAIN OFFICE OF THE ORGANIZATION.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO ADVANCE THE MISSION OF JESUS CHRIST AND TO SUPPORT THE BISHOP'S MINISTRY
